doc:
Brad F. Grinter https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brad_F._Grinter 0 Brad F. Grinter (May 18, 1922 – April 1993) was an American film director, actor, producer, and screenwriter who is best known for the 1972 cult classic horror film, Blood Freak. He also directed the 1970 film, Flesh Feast, which stars Veronica Lake in her last film appearance. His son, Randy Grinter, is a cameraman and has worked on a number of films. Brad Grinter died in April 1993, in Miami, Florida, at the age of 71. Brad's son Randy died November 16th, 2018 at the age of 69 in Gainsville, Florida, from complications related to dementia. Brad_F._Grinter ( May_18_,_1922 – April_1993 ) was an_American_film_director , actor , producer , and screenwriter who is_best_known for the_1972_cult_classic_horror_film , Blood_Freak . He also directed the_1970_film , Flesh_Feast , which stars Veronica_Lake in her_last_film_appearance . His_son , Randy_Grinter , is a_cameraman and has_worked on a_number of films . Brad_Grinter died in April_1993 , in Miami , Florida , at the_age of 71 . Brad 's_son_Randy died November_16th , 2018 at the_age of 69 in Gainsville , Florida , from complications related to dementia .
